Package org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit

Class IsoIecPolynomial1271System

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit.ModulusCheckDigit
org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit.IsoIec7064PureSystem
org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit.IsoIec7064PurePolynomialSystem
org.apache.commons.validator.routines.checkdigit.IsoIecPolynomial1271System
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CheckDigit, IsoIecConstants
public class IsoIecPolynomial1271System extends IsoIec7064PurePolynomialSystem implements IsoIecConstants
Implements ISO/IEC 7064, MOD 1271-36 polynomial check digit calculation/validation.

MOD 1271-36 applies to alphanumeric strings, the check digit has two alphanumeric chars. See Wikipedia - ISO/IEC_7064 (de) for more details.

Since:
1.10.0
Author:
EUG https://github.com/homebeaver
See Also:
